ussr.physics
Interface PhysicsObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ATRONCarController1, ATRONCarControllerForTiltSensorExperiments, ATRONController, ATRONRoleController1, ATRONSampleController1, ATRONSimpleVehicleController1, ATRONSnakeController1, ATRONSnakeController2, ATRONTestController1, MTRANSampleSimulation1, MTRANSimulation, OdinSimulation3
public interface PhysicsObserver

The physics simulation notifies observers (as per the observer design pattern) at each time step, allowing code to potentially be run at every physics step. Objects implementing this interface can be subscribed to these step events using the method PhysicsSimulation.subscribePhysicsTimestep(PhysicsObserver)

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI
See Also:
PhysicsSimulation.subscribePhysicsTimestep(PhysicsObserver)

Method Summary
 void physicsTimeStepHook(PhysicsSimulation simulation)
          Method called by the physics simulation at every time step, if this object has been subscribed to physics time step events.
 

Method Detail

physicsTimeStepHook

void physicsTimeStepHook(PhysicsSimulation simulation)
Method called by the physics simulation at every time step, if this object has been subscribed to physics time step events.

Parameters:
simulation - the simulation being observed/generating the event
